item.title: Version 1.2.13
item.description:
What's New

Release v1.2.13: Major improvements to spell checking, Vietnamese code tables, and debug logging

Features:

  • Add VNDictionaryManager and VNEngineSpellCheck for enhanced spell checking
  • Implement Unicode Compound and CP1258 Vietnamese code tables
  • Add comprehensive Vietnamese character mapping with combining diacritics
  • Move spell check settings to Advanced section with cascading disable logic
  • Optimize debug logging with file-based async logging (LogFileReader)

Improvements:

  • Refine English auto-restore functionality and word-break detection
  • Enhance VNCharacter and VNCharacterMap with better diacritic handling
  • Improve keyboard event handling and buffer reset logic
  • Update status bar manager with better state management
  • Refactor VNEngine for better code organization

Bug Fixes:

  • Fix buffer reset issue preventing proper session cleanup
  • Fix spell check feature cascading when parent setting is disabled
  • Improve build script for better release handling

Settings:

  • Reorganize Advanced section with better grouping
  • Update SharedSettings with new spell check options
  • Improve preferences model structure
